Title: Data Analyst (m/w/d)
Description:
Die Aristo Group ist eine Projekt- und Personalberatung und seit √ºber zehn Jahren auf die Life Science Branche spezialisiert. Als Performance Partner liegt unser Schwerpunkt auf der Vermittlung von selbst√§ndigen Wissensarbeitern, sowie Fach- und F√ºhrungskr√§ften f√ºr tempor√§re Projekte sowohl auf freiberuflicher Basis als auch in Festanstellung. Mit unserem breiten Netzwerk in der DACH-Region finden wir auch f√ºr Sie das ‚Äûperfect Match‚Äú f√ºr Sie.




Aufgaben:

Sie begleiten unsere Fachbereiche bei der Analyse und Interpretation von Daten.
Sie entwickeln informative Power BI Berichte, um komplexe Daten √ºbersichtlich und verst√§ndlich darzustellen.
Sie wirken an der Konzeption und Weiterentwicklung unserer Datenplattform auf Basis von Microsoft Fabric mit.
Sie stehen als Ansprechperson f√ºr analytische Fragestellungen unserer Fachbereiche zur Verf√ºgung.
Sie arbeiten eng mit externen Partnern zusammen und √ºbernehmen Aufgaben zur Koordination




Qualifikationen:

Sie verf√ºgen √ºber einen Hochschulabschluss in Informatik, Wirtschaftsinformatik, Mathematik, Betriebswirtschaft oder eine vergleichbare Qualifikation.
Sie haben bereits 3-5 Jahre Erfahrung im Bereich Business Intelligence und arbeiten routiniert mit Power BI.
Sie besitzen umfassende Kenntnisse in multidimensionalen und tabellarischen Datenmodellen basierend auf dem Star-Schema-Prinzip.
Der Umgang mit SQL und DAX ist Ihnen vertraut.
Erfahrungen in der Verwaltung und Administration des Power BI Service erg√§nzen Ihr Profil.
Sie kommunizieren sicher auf Deutsch und Englisch, jeweils auf C1-Niveau.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a skilled Python and SQL user with a strong analytical background? Are you passionate about uncovering insights within data and applying them to real-world financial challenges? Then you might just be the Data Analyst we're looking for!

Your Primary Responsibilities Will Be


Manage the end-to-end process of data-driven knowledge gathering (connect, mine, simulate, predict, illustrate, and deploy)
Create data-based solutions to address complex business challenges


What We're Looking For


Solid analytical skills (you're a natural problem solver)
Proficiency in Python and SQL (you can write advanced queries with ease)
Focus on quality (you strive for excellence in everything you do)
Strong communication skills (you can explain complex ideas in simple terms)


It Would Be Great If You Also Have


Knowledge of financial markets (options, futures, etc.)
Familiarity with financial products


If it seems like a match, don't wait! Apply now and show us what you've got üî•

What we offer;

At LYNX, we value your growth and development; we'll provide you with a supportive work environment and opportunities for your professional development.


Competitive Salary, depending on your educational level and work experience;
Pension scheme that is fully paid by LYNX;
Free lunch from our cook or lunch ticket, fresh juices & fruit;
Travel allowance;
Continuous growth potential and a training budget of ‚Ç¨ 2,000 per year;
Trips & activities with your colleagues;
Relaxed and informal working environment.


About Us

"LYNX helps you invest in yourself"

"Working at LYNX means joining the LYNX family"

"The development opportunities make LYNX the best place to work"

This is what the employees say about LYNX and it is exactly what we want to offer: a work environment where you can get the best out of yourself. At our office in the heart of Amsterdam, Ghent, Berlin and Prague, we work every day to offer both private and professional clients the best trading opportunities, with a fast, user-friendly and reliable trading platform.

The Best Choice For Anyone Who Takes Investing Seriously

LYNX is an international FinTech that offers you a relaxed and informal work environment, where you can get the best out of yourself and where 300 people contribute together to the success of our customers since 2006.

In 2006 LYNX entered the investor market with two spearheads: very low rates and an extensive product range. This makes the online broker not only successful in the Netherlands, but also abroad. After opening offices in Belgium, Germany and the Czech Republic, LYNX now offers its services in ten different countries, making it a European broker of size.

In 2019 the product of LYNX, and therefore the offer for investors, has been greatly improved. For example, a highly advanced mobile and tablet app is available, the LYNX Masterclass webinars can be watched weekly via the Knowledge Portal, and thanks to the Morning Call, investors are quickly daily informed about the latest news on the financial markets.

We're an equal-opportunity employer. We welcome applications from all suitably qualified and eligible candidates without attention to gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation/identity, disability or neurodiversity.

Title: Data Analyst / Data Engineer (m/f/d)
Description:
SafeDriver Group GmbH is a leading company in the field of safe passenger transportation and an important service partner for innovative mobility companies and global players. With over 800 dedicated employees, we implement pioneering mobility solutions in Germany's urban centers. As a growing company, we are looking for an experienced and analytically strong personality to advance our group of companies as a Data Analyst / Data Engineer (m/f/d).

Aufgaben


Building a data warehouse for efficient storage, management, and analysis of business data.
Performing data analysis and visualization with tools such as backends Google Cloud, AWS, Python, R, SQL, Tableau and Power BI.
Implementing machine learning models to predict business outcomes and optimize processes.
Analyzing large data sets to derive business trends and patterns.
Creating dashboards and reports to present insights to stakeholders.
Collaborating with internal and external teams to implement data-driven projects.
Performing Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) for data cleansing and preparation.
Development of statistical models and implementation of predictive models with Python libraries such as Pandas, NumPy and scikit-learn or similar.
Experience with ETL processes (Extract, Transform, Load) and data pipelines an advantage.



Qualifikation


Degree in data science, information technology, business informatics or a related field (e.g. B.Sc. in Data Analytics, B.Sc. in International Economics & Management).
Practical experience in data analysis, data visualization and working with databases (SQL, NoSQL, Big Query).
Knowledge of programming languages such as Python, R and SQL.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI or Excel.
Experience with graph-based databases such as Neo4j or tools for processing unstructured data (e.g. Apache Kafka) is a plus.
Familiarity with machine learning and statistics (e.g. time series analysis, regression models).
Strong analytical thinking skills and ability to solve complex data problems.
Experience working with diverse stakeholders and the ability to make complex technical concepts understandable to non-technical teams.
Language skills: Fluent in English (C1), basic knowledge of German (B1 an advantage).



Benefits


A responsible position in a growing company with a lot of creative freedom.
A dynamic and challenging working environment with the opportunity to work on exciting projects.
The opportunity to actively shape strategic decisions and support the company on its growth path.
A dynamic and motivated team, as well as short decision-making paths.
Attractive remuneration and development opportunities.
Training opportunities and support for professional development.



We look forward to receiving your complete application documents including your salary expectations and earliest possible starting date.
Show more

Title: Digital Data Specialist
Description:
Your Role: As a Digital Data Specialist, you‚Äôll be the architect behind our data-driven success story. You‚Äôll be responsible for gathering, analyzing, and interpreting digital data to uncover actionable insights. From optimizing marketing campaigns to enhancing user experiences, your expertise will be instrumental in shaping our strategies and driving growth.

What You‚Äôll Do:


Dive deep into digital data sources to extract meaningful insights.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives and translate them into data requirements.
Develop and implement data collection strategies across various digital platforms.
Analyze data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for optimization.
Create compelling data visualizations and reports to communicate findings effectively.
Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously innovate our data practices.


What We‚Äôre Looking For:


Passion for data-driven decision-making and problem-solving.
Strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail.
Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, or similar.
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or Domo.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to convey complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders.
Proven track record of driving business impact through data insights.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field (or equivalent experience).


Why Join Us:


Opportunity to work with a dynamic team of industry experts and thought leaders.
Flexible remote work environment, empowering you to balance work and life.
Ongoing learning and development opportunities to fuel your professional growth.
Competitive compensation package and benefits.

Title: Online Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a detail-oriented individual with a passion for research and a good understanding of national and local geography? Enjoy the freedom to work at your own pace, from anywhere in Germany you feel comfortable.




What you'll do:

In this role, you will be working on a project aimed at enhancing the content and quality of digital maps that are used by millions of people worldwide
Completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment such as verifying and comparing data, and determining the relevance and accuracy of information.




Why Join Us?

Flexible, part-time hours ‚Äî work when it suits you.
Be part of a global AI community with 1 million+ contributors.
Opportunity to work on projects for top global brands.
Mental health support and access to well-being tools.




Basic Requirements

Residing in Germany for at least two consecutive years and demonstrating full professional proficiency in both German and English.
A comprehensive understanding of contemporary and historical events in business, media, sports, news, social media, and cultural affairs within Germany.
Skilled in adhering to guidelines and conducting online research using search engines, digital maps, and various website resources.
Capable of managing a diverse range of tasks, including those related to maps, news, audio analysis, and relevance assessment.
Access to a high-speed broadband internet connection, a personal computer, and the necessary software tools.




To join the program, you'll take an open-book qualification exam to assess your suitability and complete ID verification. Our team will provide guidelines and learning materials before the exam, which you can complete at your convenience within a set timeframe. This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks.




Payment Information:

The rate of pay per task includes the time required to read the task guidelines. Payment will be issued in accordance with the terms outlined in the contributor agreement, upon successful completion of the tasks.




Ready to earn extra while contributing to the advancement of technology?




To get started, simply click "Apply Now." Make sure your device location is set to Germany for location validation. Then, create an account and complete the required fields. Set German as your primary language and English as your secondary language. Upload your CV in English (PDF format preferred)

Title: Data Analyst (m/w/d) Pricing
Description:
Die DocMorris Gesundheitsplattform ist eine 100-prozentige Tochter der Schweizer DocMorris AG, die im Segment Deutschland im Jahr 2022 einen Au√üenumsatz von 1.081,6 Millionen Euro bei derzeit √ºber 10 Millionen aktiven Kunden erwirtschaftete. Die Plattform umfasst s√§mtliche Aktivit√§ten rund um die digitale ganzheitliche Gesundheitsversorgung ‚Äì von der Diagnose beim Online-Arztbesuch bis zur pharmazeutischen Beratung und dem ben√∂tigten Medikament, Gesundheitsprodukt oder der digitalen L√∂sung. Die DocMorris-Gesundheitsplattform ist Marktf√ºhrer im Bereich Online-Apotheken sowie f√ºhrender Anbieter von Health-Tech-L√∂sungen im Verordnungsprozess und in der Telemedizin. So schafft DocMorris f√ºr die Kunden einen einfachen Zugang zu allen Gesundheitsdienstleistungen an einem Ort.




Deine Aufgaben im Bereich Pricing und Datenanalyse:

Erstellung von Reportings & Analysen: Du entwickelst detaillierte Reportings und f√ºhrst Ad-hoc-Analysen durch, um Umsatz-, Margen- und Preisentwicklungen sowie den Erfolg unserer Promotionen im E-Commerce-Bereich zu messen und zu optimieren.
Strategische Empfehlungen: Basierend auf deinen Analysen erarbeitest du Handlungsempfehlungen f√ºr Pricing-Strategien und taktische Entscheidungen, die ma√ügeblich zur Umsatzsteigerung und Marge unserer Produkte im Bereich freiverk√§uflicher Arzneimittel beitragen.
Prozess- und Algorithmus-Optimierung: Du entwickelst unsere Pricing-Prozesse und -Algorithmen weiter, indem du komplexe Analysemethoden anwendest und neue Datenstrategien im E-Commerce-Bereich etablierst.
Interdisziplin√§re Zusammenarbeit: In enger Abstimmung mit den Bereichen Online Marketing, Category Management, Supply Chain Management, Einkauf und unserem Data Team optimierst du die Pricing-Strategien f√ºr unsere Produkte.




Das bringst Du mit:

Ein abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium in Mathematik, Statistik, Wirtschaftsinformatik oder Betriebswirtschaftslehre (BWL) bildet die Grundlage deiner analytischen F√§higkeiten.
Kommerzielles Verst√§ndnis im Bereich E-Commerce, idealerweise im Bereich Pricing.
Du hast praktische Erfahrung im Umgang mit relationalen Datenbanken und beherrschst SQL. Kenntnisse in BI- und Visualisierungstools wie Tableau, Power BI oder QlikView sind von Vorteil.
Du bringst Erfahrung mit statistischen Analysemethoden sowie in der Anwendung von Statistik-Softwarepaketen mit und zeichnest dich durch eine analytische, strukturierte Arbeitsweise aus.




Arbeiten und Leben bei DocMorris

Bei DocMorris haben wir ein Umfeld geschaffen, in dem die Zusammenarbeit im Team im Mittelpunkt steht. Unsere Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter vereinen Leidenschaft und Spa√ü an der Arbeit mit Tatkraft, Eigeninitiative und Unternehmergeist. So erzielen wir gemeinsam hervorragende Ergebnisse.

Wir m√∂chten ein m√∂glichst gesundes Arbeitsumfeld schaffen, in dem sich alle Mitarbeitenden wohlf√ºhlen und ihre F√§higkeiten entfalten k√∂nnen. Wir bieten eine Vielzahl von Initiativen, um ein ausgewogenes Verh√§ltnis von Berufs- und Privatleben zu erm√∂glichen, darunter flexible Arbeitszeiten, Teilzeitarbeit und die M√∂glichkeit zur Telearbeit. Unsere Benefits umfassen Betriebliche Altersvorsorge, Arbeitsunf√§higkeitsversicherung, Fahrkostenerstattung, verg√ºnstigte Mitarbeiteraktien und vieles mehr.

Komm in unser Team und bringe Deine Ideen und F√§higkeiten aktiv in unsere Mission ein, Gesundheit neu zu denken. Ob Apotheker, IT-Experte oder Unternehmer, kreativer Ideengeber oder strukturiert arbeitender, logischer Denker, F√ºhrungskraft oder Auszubildender - bei DocMorris kann jeder Einzelne den Unterschied ausmachen.
